definition: a protective covering that covers or forms the top of a building, provide a building with a roof
details:
noun
- a protective covering that covers or forms the top of a building
- protective covering on top of a motor vehicle
- an upper limit on what is allowed
= synonyms: cap
- the inner top surface of a covered area or hollow space
= example: the inner top surface of a covered area or hollow space
verb
- provide a building with a roof
= example: provide a building with a roof
